Portsmouth Harbour: Between a departure and anarrival in the same Platform
Platforms 3, 4 and 5 are restricted to 12 cars only and, if there are 12 cars they must not consist of more than twotrains.
Platforming restrictions apply to trains formed of Class 165 or 166 – check Sectional Appendix for details.
Class 159 DMUUp direction services departing between 0600 and 0900 or Down direction services arrivingbetween 1700 and 1930 Monday to Friday
Class 159 DMUUp direction services departing between 0600 and 0900 or Down direction services arrivingbetween 1700 and 1930 Monday to Friday
Class 159 DMUUp direction services departing between 0545 and 0845 or Down direction services arrivingbetween 1715 and 1945 Monday to Friday

* If a down train is signalled via Laverstock Loop then a train signalled from Salisbury to the Romsey directionmust be held at signal SY40 until the train which has traversed Laverstock Loop has cleared signal SY34
